sentences.sContent: A data manager, media coordinator, and medical anthropologist will also be arriving over the weekend.
sentences.sContent_eng: A data manager, media coordinator, and medical anthropologist will also be arriving over the weekend.
sentences.sCn: 一名数据管理员、媒体协调员和医学人类学家也将于周末抵达。

sentences.sContent: “It’s an embarrassment of riches because the preservation is so remarkable,” said Adam T. Smith, an anthropologist at the University of Chicago who has visited the cave.
sentences.sContent_eng: “It’s an embarrassment of riches because the preservation is so remarkable,” said Adam T. Smith, an anthropologist at the University of Chicago who has visited the cave.
sentences.sCn: “它让富人们感到难堪，因为储存物是如此得不寻常，”亚当-T-史密斯说，他是芝加哥大学的人类学家，刚刚参观完那个洞穴。

sentences.sContent: But Peter Wood, an anthropologist, the author of “Diversity: The Invention of a Concept” and a critic of the Grutter decision, argues that the educational value of racial diversity is problematic.
sentences.sContent_eng: But Peter Wood, an anthropologist, the author of “Diversity: The Invention of a Concept” and a critic of the Grutter decision, argues that the educational value of racial diversity is problematic.
sentences.sCn: 但是人类学家彼得·伍德——《多元化——一个概念的创造》的作者，格拉特案裁决的批评者——则争辩说种族多元化的教育价值是有疑问的。

words.tran: 人为的；[人类] 人类起源的
以人类为中心的；以人类观点解释宇宙万物的
人类起源学的；人类起源的
人类本位说；人类中心说
